outputs.output_descr: Interim support to aid coordination, harmonisation and alignment for development effectiveness in Rwanda. This project builds on the achievements of DEX project no. 00040553, with a view to ensuring greater national ownership of the aid effectiveness agenda and a gradual transfer of capacities and responsibilty for the management of Rwanda's aid coordination architecture to national entities.

project_descr: Support to Aid Coordination, Harmonisation and Alignment for Development Effectiveness in Rwanda
